createShiftDialog.endTimeAfterStartTimeError: End time must be after start time.

shiftPage.title: Shift Details
shiftPage.viewingDetailsFor: Viewing details for shift starting at {{startHour}} and ending at {{endHour}}.
shiftPage.unableToFetchShift: Unable to fetch shift. Please check your connection.

assignBreakDialog.title: Assign Break to Shift
assignBreakDialog.description: Select a break from the list to assign it to the current shift.
assignBreakDialog.label: Choose a break
assignBreakDialog.unableToFetch: Unable to fetch breaks. Please check your connection.
assignBreakDialog.assignmentFailed: Failed to assign break. Please check your connection and try again.

createNewBreakDialog.title: Create New Break
createNewBreakDialog.description: If a suitable break doesn't exist, you can create a new one here.

breaksTable.name: Break Name
breaksTable.noBreaksAssigned: No breaks have been assigned to this shift.

editShiftDialog.title: Edit Shift
editShiftDialog.description: Update the details of the shift below.
editShiftDialog.endTimeAfterStartTimeError: End time must be after start time.

deleteShiftDialog.title: Delete Shift
deleteShiftDialog.description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the shift "{{shiftName}}"? This action cannot be undone.

deleteShiftErrors.inUseByResource: Cannot delete shift. It is assigned as a regular shift to one or more resources.
deleteShiftErrors.inUseBySchedule: Cannot delete shift. It is used in one or more weekly schedules.
deleteShiftErrors.inUseByAlternative: Cannot delete shift. It is assigned as an alternative shift to one or more resources.
deleteShiftErrors.notFound: Shift not found. It may have already been deleted.
deleteShiftErrors.internal: An unexpected server error occurred. Please try again later.
deleteShiftErrors.unknown: An unknown error occurred while trying to delete the shift.
